content:
Intersystems are having FIHR contest and want to invite you and your developers to participate.

See http://openexchange.intersystems.com/ for details (there are contests there with money prizes).
Thanks @Grahame Grieve ! The actual link to the contest is here: https://openexchange.intersystems.com/contest/current.

We made a FHIR Accelerator as a Service (FHIRaaS) on AWS and invite FHIR developers to try it and build apps around. Here you can get free access and spin up your InterSystems FHIR Accelerator Server on AWS: https://community.intersystems.com/post/how-use-intersystems-iris-fhir-accelerator-service-fhiraas-aws

You can participate in the contest, build and publish on GitHub an open-source app with ANY technology that works with FHIRaaS. The best apps will collect $8.75K money prizes and a lot of publicity. Details: https://community.intersystems.com/post/intersystems-fhir-accelerator-programming-contest
There are two weeks starting from today to build the app and participate in the contest!
This topic was moved by Josh Mandel to #smart/scheduling-links > Castlight Demo
